function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Non-normative obligation to obey the law","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting in-person surveys or interviews for data collection may pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases for both data collectors and participants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Measurement error in survey questions or responses","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in survey responses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived clarity of covid-19 measures may be low, leading to confusion and potential non-adherence to the guidelines.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of an item due to low cronbach’s alpha may result in a loss of valuable insights or aspects of the phenomenon under study.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Measurement of negative impact and emotions related to covid-19 measures may lead to psychological distress for participants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of 25 participants providing professional care for covid-19 patients increases the risk of bias in the final sample.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of personal data such as age, gender, education, and health status increases the risk of privacy breaches.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential influence of political orientation on compliance with pandemic measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for non-compliance with rules and requests","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher impulsivity predicting non-compliance","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative emotions leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear rules leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived capacity and knowledge affecting compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concordance between self-report and objective compliance measures differs based on the method of assessment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in compliance may be influenced by substantive moral support for measures and perception of costs and strain","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay at home and social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of moral appeals for compliance","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of sanctions for non-compliance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-reported behavior studies may not capture the full extent of compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive studies on compliance factors for covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social distancing measures not being followed","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay-at-home orders","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in sustaining long-term compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High stability of sars-cov-2 and sars-cov-1 in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus titer reduction on different surfaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exponential decay in virus titer across experimental conditions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in experimental data especially on cardboard surfaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 aerosol stability","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surface stability of sars-cov-2 on plastic and steel","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of sars-cov-2 with sars-cov-1","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to transform crisis into an opportunity for social and environmental reimagining","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of global leadership in coordinating a response to the crisis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective regulation of supply chains and global corporations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rebuilding public healthcare infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of global leadership in responding to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undermining of the who and inadequate global responses to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-exploitation of forest and other ecologies leading to imbalance in nature","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited civil liberties due to containment measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Authoritarian measures in response to the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of neoliberalism as a remedy to pandemic-related failures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gig workers continue to work despite covid-19 symptoms, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmentation of employment services and vocational training creates challenges for displaced workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of temporary migrants from economic stimulus and welfare packages","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of an underclass of migrant workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited utility of new policy measures for temporary migrants","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impact of government measures on young workers and immigrants","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of migrant workers to exploitation and abuse","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
